com.mk4droid.IMC_Store

Class Constants_API

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mk4droid.IMC_Store.Constants_API

  • public class Constants_API
extends Object
    Customization for your application is feasible here. HINT: Be careful when to use http:// or https:// in downloading and uploading data. It highly depends on your platform HINT2: Be careful with the paths of your remote server. Paths may differ per installation configuration. These constants are visible everywhere in the app.
    Author:
    Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COM_Protocol
      Transmitting protocol
      static String COM_Protocol_S
      Secure transmitting protocol.
      static String ContactEmail
      The e-mail to contact with the support
      static String DefaultLanguage
      Default menu language, options: "en - English" or "el - Ελληνικά" Go also to res/myprefs.xml to android:key="LanguageAR" and set android:defaultValue="el - Ελληνικά" or "en - English" in order to have a correct initial value for the radius buttons.
      static String EncKey
      Encryption key for transmitting password (16 digits).
      static String Flurry_Key
      Key for Flurry analytics that monitors usage of application see www.flurry.com Use your own key.
      static int initRange
      Issues are downloaded within user's range.
      static double locUserPred_Lat
      Define a location which can be used when user position is unavailable, such as provider is null, GPS fix not feasible etc.
      static double locUserPred_Long 
      static String phpExec
      Server path of application
      static String remoteImages
      Server path of issue images
      static String ServerSTR
      Server address.
      static String TAG
      TAG for Log of messages to alleviate debugging

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static String TAG
        TAG for Log of messages to alleviate debugging

      • ContactEmail

        public static String ContactEmail
        The e-mail to contact with the support

      • COM_Protocol

        public static String COM_Protocol
        Transmitting protocol

      • COM_Protocol_S

        public static String COM_Protocol_S
        Secure transmitting protocol. If your server supports SSL then this should be https://

      • ServerSTR

        public static String ServerSTR
        Server address. It can be a XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX address instead

      • phpExec

        public static String phpExec
        Server path of application

      • remoteImages

        public static String remoteImages
        Server path of issue images

      • EncKey

        public static String EncKey
        Encryption key for transmitting password (16 digits). It should be the same as in your ImproveMyCity joomla component. The default value is 1234567890123456 (choose this as a quick start to connect with your server).

      • DefaultLanguage

        public static String DefaultLanguage
        Default menu language, options: "en - English" or "el - Ελληνικά" Go also to res/myprefs.xml to android:key="LanguageAR" and set android:defaultValue="el - Ελληνικά" or "en - English" in order to have a correct initial value for the radius buttons.

      • Flurry_Key

        public static String Flurry_Key
        Key for Flurry analytics that monitors usage of application see www.flurry.com Use your own key. To set default value (enable or disable) Flurry analytics see at res/myprefs.xml go to android:key="AnalyticsSW" and set android:defaultValue="true" or "false"

      • locUserPred_Lat

        public static double locUserPred_Lat
        Define a location which can be used when user position is unavailable, such as provider is null, GPS fix not feasible etc.

      • locUserPred_Long

        public static double locUserPred_Long

      • initRange

        public static int initRange
        Issues are downloaded within user's range. Set default value here (meters). 20000000 m is considered the infinite range.

        public Constants_API()
